channel.title: Client loading bar help!
channel.description:
how do i change the color of this loading bar on the client
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/jjsn7d.jpg[/img]
I want to change it to purple which is this
[code]0xBD04EB[/code]
but i cant find the original red color. so i cant swap it
Thanks. all help is appriciated
-Elvemage 0o [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Senior member should know better.[/center]
